content: Perhaps the EPA should be completely defunded and pink slips sent to all those disloyal employees. They should remember that they work for the American people and do their best to accomplish their assigned goals. All these protests do is remind us that they all have political agendas of their own which all people are allowed to have, but not on the public’s dime. Get back to work or go home. If there is no money for your pet cause, well adios amigos, hope you had fun while it lasted.
